CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Topics.​GroupedTopics
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Topics.​GroupedTopics

A list of Topics divided into TopicGroups.

Functions
GroupedTopics
public GroupedTopics (
List<Topic> topics
)

Creates a new list with the passed topics and no grouping applied.

CreateGroup
public void CreateGroup (
int startingIndex,
int count
)

Creates a grouping in the topic list.  Groups do not have to encompass every topic but they must be created in order and must not overlap.

RemoveGroupAndTopics
public void RemoveGroupAndTopics (
int groupIndex
)

Removes the group from the list and any Topics associated with it.

MergeGroupInto
public void MergeGroupInto (
int groupIndex,
GroupedTopics target,
int targetGroupIndex
)

Adds the members of a group to the end of a group in another list.  The original group and its topics will be deleted.  If the original group has a header it will be discarded.

MoveGroupTo
public void MoveGroupTo (
int groupIndex,
GroupedTopics target,
int targetGroupIndex = -1
)

Moves the group and its topics to the target list.  If a target group index is specified it will be inserted at that position.  If not it will be added to the end of the list.

AppendToGroup
public void AppendToGroup (
int groupIndex,
Topic topic
)

Adds a Topic to the end of the group.
